summary_md: Malta, in the year 2024, has a GDP per capita of 33,467 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD), with an inflation rate of 1.65% (FP.CPI.TOTL.ZG), and an unemployment rate of 2.70% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS). The average life expectancy is 83.51 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN), and internet usage stands at 92.10% (IT.NET.USER.ZS). The country's export growth is represented by 123.47% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).

sections.economy_md: Malta's economy is characterized by a GDP per capita of 33,467 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD) and an export growth of 123.47% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).
sections.labor_md: The labor market in Malta shows an unemployment rate of 2.70% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS), indicating a relatively stable employment environment.
sections.digital_md: Internet penetration in Malta is at 92.10% (IT.NET.USER.ZS), reflecting a well-connected digital infrastructure.
sections.health_env_md: The average life expectancy in Malta is 83.51 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN), suggesting a healthy living environment.
